text.section:
This section applies to a semipermanent food service facility that:
Operates in Anne Arundel County;
Was licensed under § 21-305 of this subtitle on or before December 1, 2010; and
Was not sold or transferred to another operator after December 1, 2010.

An operator of a semipermanent food service facility shall:
Pump out the onboard wastewater holding tank as frequently as required by Anne Arundel County to avoid creating a public health nuisance;
Remove wastewater by:
Hiring a licensed liquid waste hauler to dispose of the wastewater; or
Disposing of the wastewater at a wastewater disposal facility approved by Anne Arundel County;
Use a food grade hose and an adequate backflow prevention device to maintain a potable water supply; and
Demonstrate compliance with items (1) and (2) of this subsection by quarterly submitting a record of receipts to the issuer of the license.
